front.title: Associated Gateway Exchange in Multi-segment SD-WAN

abstract.t: The document describes the control plane enhancement for multi- segment SD-WAN to exchange the associated GW information between edges. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the Inter-Domain Routing Working Group mailing list (idr@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/idr/. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/VMatrix1900/draft-sheng-idr-gw-exchange-in-sd-wan.
